name: repo-provas
description: RepoProvas is an API developed in node.js, using TypeScript. It is intended to manage exams that are given in an academic environment.

scripts.test:prisma:run: npm run test:load-envs npm run prisma:migrate && npm run test:load-envs npm run prisma:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:load-envs npm run prisma:migrate && npm run test:jest
scripts.dev:prisma:migrate: npm run dev:load-envs npm run prisma:migrate
scripts.dev:prisma:seed: npm run dev:load-envs npm run prisma:seed
scripts.prod:prisma:migrate: npm run prod:load-envs npm run prisma:migrate
scripts.prod:prisma:seed: npm run prod:load-envs npm run prisma:seed
scripts.docker:start: NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.docker prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e .env.docker node dist/src/server.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npx tsc --outDir dist && prisma migrate deploy && ts-node prisma/seed.ts
